${ModID}:Aqueducts.NAME: Aqueducts
${ModID}:Aqueducts.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you draw an extr一张牌, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies。

${ModID}:Cascade.NAME: Cascade
${ModID}:Cascade.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. 获得 !B! 格挡 for each card 丢弃ed this way。

${ModID}:Hail.NAME: Hail
${ModID}:Hail.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal an additional !D! damage for each time this was 丢弃ed 本场战斗。

${ModID}:HighTide.NAME: High Tide
${ModID}:HighTide.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 每当 you ${ModID}:Flow, return this from the 弃牌堆 to your hand。

${ModID}:IcyFloe.NAME: Icy Floe
${ModID}:IcyFloe.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. NL Next turn, NL 获得 [E] [E]。

${ModID}:Pneumatics.NAME: Pneumatics

${ModID}:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve
${ModID}:ReleaseValve.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you ${ModID}:Flow, enemy takes !M! damage for each card 丢弃ed. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Reservoir.NAME: Reservoir
${ModID}:Reservoir.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. Draw cards equal to the number of cards 丢弃ed this way. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Reservoir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. Draw cards equal to the number of cards 丢弃ed this way。

${ModID}:StormFront.NAME: Storm Front
${ModID}:StormFront.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL When 丢弃ed, add this back to your hand with !M! more damage。
